page.title: 14Warsop Playground Games.
page.content: The most popular games are running, skipping and ball games.Examples are: { {Run Across}_One middle person catches players who run across.Those caught help that person to catch others. {Elastic}_With elastic stretched around their ankles forming 2 parallel lines, 2 players stand 2m.apart. A 3rd.child jumps outside the elastic,inside,onto, inside again and then jumps clear. If the elastic is caught at the wrong time that child is out.The elastic is gradually raised higher and higher to the thighs until there is a winner. {Catch}_A ball is thrown to a child.If the player drops the ball a handicap is imposed.Successive handicaps are given with each failure so that the player goes down on one knee,then two, one elbow,then two and so on until he is lying on the floor and eliminated.
